miic.core.miic_utils.dv_dataframe_weight¶

dv_dataframe_weight(dv, corr)[source]¶

Multiply column-by-column two DataFrame

This funciton multiplies column-by-column two DataFrame and returns the obtained DataFrame. One possible application is where one of the two DataFrames represents a weight for the other like what happend when averaging multiple velocity changes for the same stations-pair obtained with different componens.

Parameters:
  • dv (DataFrame) – First DataFrame
  • corr (DataFrame) – Second DataFrame
Return type:

DataFrame
Returns:

dv_weighted: dv_weighted[col] = dv[col] * corr[col] for all col in dv
